Name: Peacock egg mayonnaise
Description: Wild smell and a mild taste, it is really pleasant to eat.

NameLocalization.es: mayonesa de huevo de pavo real
NameLocalization.ja: 孔雀の卵のマヨネーズ

DescriptionLocalization.es: De olor salvaje y sabor suave, es realmente agradable de comer.
DescriptionLocalization.ko: 야생 냄새와 부드러운 맛, 먹기에 정말 즐겁습니다.
DescriptionLocalization.de: Wilder Geruch und ein milder Geschmack, es ist wirklich angenehm zu essen.
DescriptionLocalization.fr: Odeur sauvage et un goût doux, il est vraiment agréable à manger.
DescriptionLocalization.hu: Vad illata és enyhe íze, igazán kellemes enni.
DescriptionLocalization.it: Profumo selvatico e sapore delicato, è davvero piacevole da mangiare.
DescriptionLocalization.ja: ワイルドな香りとまろやかな味わいで、とっても気持ちいいです。
DescriptionLocalization.pt: Cheiro silvestre e um sabor suave, realmente é agradável de comer.
DescriptionLocalization.ru: Дикий запах и мягкий вкус, его действительно приятно есть.
DescriptionLocalization.tr: Yabani koku ve hafif bir tat, yemesi gerçekten keyifli.
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 野生的气味和温和的味道，吃起来真的很愉快。
